Description: Up for sale is my PGM90HAM Paul Gilbert Anniversary edition. These guitars are super rare and this is 1 of 300 ever made - There are none for sale on the internet right now so heres your chance to grab a collectable. This guitar plays amazingly well and is currently setup with low action and no fret buzz. I have taken as many photos of the cosmetic condition - Cosmetically there are no major dings or scratches however the clear coat has a bit of yellowing as the guitar is over 20 years old - This happens on all Ibanez PGM's of this vintage. Frets are about 75% with plenty of life left in them. Note: The tuners are Gotoh locking tuners and one of the string ferrules was replaced with a goto string ferrule - I can include the other 5 as I haven't installed them yet. Guitar comes in the original hard case with the Certificate and signed on the back plate by Gilbert himself. Pickup available in Mulgrave, VIC or I can ship to the major countries. in:Guitar models manufactured in Japan, Guitar models, Paul Gilbert models, and 6 morePGM90HAMEDIT SHAREPortal: Paul Gilbert series | Signature series | Guitar models PGM90HAMThe PGM90HAM is a PGM series solid body electric guitar model introduced by Ibanez in 1998. It is a signature model of American guitarist Paul Gilbert.The PGM90HAM was a limited edition model made in honor of the 90th anniversary of the Hoshino Gakki company which produces Ibanez guitars. The model name references this — "90HAM" stands for 90th Hoshino Anniversary Model. John Petrucci, Joe Satriani and Steve Vai also received "90HAM" models which were released concurrently. Just 337 PGM90HAM examples were sold worldwide.Features include a basswood body with flamed maple top and abalone binding, an ebony fingerboard, a reversed headstock, DiMarzio pickups, a standard hard-tail bridge and Paul Gilbert's signature painted F-holes.SpecificationsSpecifications for PGM90HAMModel name:PGM90HAMYear(s) produced:1998Sold in:WorldwideMade in:JapanBodyBody type: Solid bodyBody material: Basswood with flamed maple top and abalone bindingNeck joint: AANJBridge: Gotoh GTC101 fixedHardware color: Cosmo blackNeckNeck type: WizardNeck material: 3-piece maple/ bubingaFingerboard material: Bound ebonyFingerboard inlays: Off-set dot at 12th "90th Anniversary Model" at 24thFrets: 24 / jumboElectronicsPickup configuration: HSHBridge pickup: DiMarzio Tone ZoneMiddle pickup: DiMarzio JEM SingleNeck pickup: DiMarzio Tone ZoneControls: Master volume / 5-way lever
Title: ibanez PGM 90 HAM Paul Gilbert 90th Anniversary Guitar *RARE*
ConditionDescription: The guitar is in 8/10 condition - No majors nicks or scratches, the guitar is 20 years old so the clear coat has started to yellow like all PGM's of this age.
